main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Jacksonville, Florida on June 13, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as silver in color and cigar-shaped, approximately 40 ft long., The object had no visible means of propulsion and moved at high speed., Observers noted that the object appeared to change direction or maneuver., The sighting lasted for about 1 minute and was witnessed by several people., Additional documentation included information about a separate sighting described as a bright white object changing to red after separation.
witness description: civilian observers including a steel engineer from RCA
